name: Switchover
description:
How long can you last in Flip Flop? Simply tap the screen to swap game play from top to bottom or bottom to top.

> Tap to move ball to top or bottom
> Avoid spikes that are not the same color as the ball
> Score points by collecting spikes that are the same color as the ball
> Ball changes colors
> Beat your friends!

How long will you last?
